headline: A Look At McCormick (MKC) Valuation After Earnings Miss, Softer 2026 Guidance And Insider Share Moves
summary: McCormick (MKC) has drawn fresh attention after reporting quarterly earnings that missed analyst forecasts, even as revenue topped expectations. The company’s 2026 guidance and insider share moves pointed to ongoing cost and inflation pressures. See our latest analysis for McCormick. At a share price of $71.49, McCormick has seen a 10.72% 90 day share price return and a 6.26% year to date share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return of a 4.68% decline shows longer term momentum has...
